text: Chuchle battle was a student brawl fought in a Chuchle restaurant on June 29, 1881, resulting in several wounds and a general hangover, a swatch of Czech and German chauvinism in the late 19th century, just before the Charles- Ferdinand University was divided into Czech Charles-Ferdinand University and German Charles-Ferdinand University part in 1882. Category:1881 in Europe Category:19th century in Prague
title: Chuchle battle
